sentence.Network_en: Their son watched helplessly as they vanished beneath the waves.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的儿子无助地看着他们消失在大浪中。

sentence.Network_en: He watched helplessly as his mother died an agonizing death.
sentence.Network_cn: 他无助地看着母亲痛苦地死去。

sentence.Network_en: Cross-currents can sweep the strongest swimmer helplessly away.
sentence.Network_cn: 即使最强壮的游泳者也会无助地被交叉水流冲走。

entry.tran: 无助的;无力量的;无能力的;不由自主的
entry.def: If you are helpless, you do not have the strength or power to do anything useful or to control or protect yourself.

example.ex: Parents often feel helpless, knowing that all the cuddles in the world won't stop the tears...
example.tran: 父母经常感到无能为力，因为他们知道无论多少次拥抱也无法止住眼泪。

example.ex: Children are dying, and I am helpless to do anything...
example.tran: 孩子们已奄奄一息，而我却无力做任何事情。

auth_sentence.content: Pain that had me crying out and vomiting helplessly.
auth_sentence.res_content: Pain that had me crying out and vomiting helplessly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Pain that had me crying out and vomiting helplessly.

auth_sentence.content: She looked helplessly at the floor around their feet.
auth_sentence.res_content: She looked helplessly at the floor around their feet.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She looked helplessly at the floor around their feet.

auth_sentence.content: The shark lies still, looking at us helplessly.
auth_sentence.res_content: The shark lies still, looking at us helplessly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The shark lies still, looking at us helplessly.

sentences.en: Cold and hungry, they drifted helplessly towards the Arctic.
sentences.cn: 他们又冷又饿，无助地漂向北极。

sentences.en: She was pinned helplessly to the desk.
sentences.cn: 她被按到桌子上无法动弹。

sentences.en: Many companies have watched helplessly as their stock prices fell.
sentences.cn: 股价下跌时,许多公司无能为力地看着。

sentences.en: He shrugged helplessly and said nothing.
sentences.cn: 他无可奈何地耸耸肩，什么也没说。

sentences.en: She watched helplessly as her husband was dragged away.
sentences.cn: 她眼睁睁地看着丈夫被拉走了。
